prod_desc: Take the Ferry to your next adventure!
prod_long_desc:
Keep things moving in LEGO® City with the Ferry, featuring opening gates, space for a car, 2 fire extinguishers and other accessories. Includes 2 minifigures: a businessperson and ferry boat captain.
Includes 2 minifigures: a businessperson and ferry boat captain.
Features a Ferry with gates that can be raised and lowered and a space above the deck for the captain to pilot the boat.
Also includes a car.
Open the gate and help the captain load the car onto the boat.
Accessory elements include a mug, phone and 2 fire extinguishers.
Ferry measures over 6” high, 13” long and 5” wide.
Car measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
